name: Whale and Dolphin Conservation
memberOrga: WDC has a range of supporters across the EU. We have only noted supporters who are financial supporters, but we also have active campaigning members in other EU and global countries not indicated here.
goal:
WDC, Whale and Dolphin Conservation is a leading global charity dedicated to the conservation and protection of whales and dolphins. We defend these remarkable creatures against the many threats they face through campaigns, lobbying, advising governments, conservation projects, field research and rescue.

Our vision is a world where every whale and dolphin is safe and free.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Research and Technology, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
Nature Protection legislation and policy

Marine Policy

EU's International Relations through MEAs

Fisheries Policy and Bycatch Policy
